cluster_relations.rel_desc: Stories function as warnings directed at listeners.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that the subject issues a warning or cautionary message directed toward the object.
cluster_relations.object_class_label: Story and Legend Audiences (including Cautionary Narratives)

cluster_relations.rel_desc: Stories alert their audience to various dangers.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that a narrative or communicative artifact serves to alert an audience to specific risks, harms, or dangers.

qualifiers.OtherQualifier: Scope: various threats, harms, or risks

cluster_relations.rel_desc: Listeners are made aware of perceived threats through the warnings in stories.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that the subject attains awareness or recognition of the object.
cluster_relations.subject_class_label: Story and Legend Audiences (including Cautionary Narratives)
cluster_relations.object_class_label: Urban Legend Emotional Themes and Responses
remarks: Connects two related danger/threat notions across sentences.
Connects two related danger/threat notions across sentences.

args.justification: This relation describes stories alerting audiences to dangers, which is a communicative warning act, semantically aligned with the existing 'warning_communication_relation' used for similar narrative-to-audience warnings. Using the same rel_cls and placing it under the COMMUNICATION group improves consistency with RelR_c73faab887e3 and better reflects that this is a warning message rather than generic information.

executed_decisions.justification: This relation describes stories alerting audiences to dangers, which is a communicative warning act, semantically aligned with the existing 'warning_communication_relation' used for similar narrative-to-audience warnings. Using the same rel_cls and placing it under the COMMUNICATION group improves consistency with RelR_c73faab887e3 and better reflects that this is a warning message rather than generic information.
